test_cases.objective: Verify that the LIMS sample login screens are correctly configured to capture site-specific attributes as specified in URS-LIMS-004.
prerequisites: Test user with Analyst role created

test_steps.action: Log in to the LIMS system using Analyst credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and is presented with the main LIMS dashboard.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the sample login screen and attempt to register a new sample.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample login screen displays all required fields as specified in URS-LIMS-004.

test_steps.action: Enter test data into all fields and submit the sample registration.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts the data and stores it correctly, including expiry date calculation.

acceptance_criteria: All required fields from URS-LIMS-004 are present and functional
System correctly calculates expiry date based on product master data
Storage conditions dropdown contains all specified options
data_integrity_requirements: All data entered must be accurately stored and retrievable
Audit trail must record all sample registration activities

test_cases.objective: Verify that the LIMS system correctly integrates with SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter as specified in URS-LIMS-003.

test_steps.action: Log in to the LIMS system using Analyst credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and is presented with the main LIMS dashboard.

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample registration that requires data from SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: LIMS successfully retrieves required master data from SAP ERP.

test_steps.action: Complete the sample registration and verify data synchronization.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample data is correctly synchronized between LIMS and SAP ERP.

acceptance_criteria: LIMS successfully connects to SAP ERP using standard adapter
All required master data is correctly retrieved
Data synchronization occurs without errors
data_integrity_requirements: Data transferred between systems must maintain integrity
Audit trail must record all integration activities

test_cases.test_name: Integration Test with SAP ERP System
test_cases.objective: Verify the successful integration of the LIMS with the SAP ERP system using the vendor's standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample data transfer from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transferred without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the received data in SAP ERP matches the sent data from LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data integrity is maintained with no discrepancies.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer completes successfully
No data discrepancies found
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurate and complete
Audit trail must be maintained

test_cases.objective: Ensure the LIMS can handle a throughput of 500 samples per day as specified.

test_steps.action: Load 500 sample records into the LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: All samples are registered without system lag or errors.

test_steps.action: Process all samples through the configured workflows.
test_steps.expected_result: Samples are processed within acceptable time frames.

acceptance_criteria: All samples are processed within the day
System performance remains stable
data_integrity_requirements: Sample data must be accurate
Audit trail must be maintained

test_cases.test_name: Integration with SAP ERP via Vendor Adapter
test_cases.objective: Verify the LIMS successfully integrates with SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter for data exchange.
prerequisites: LIMS system is installed and configured
SAP ERP system is available and accessible

test_steps.action: Log into the LIMS system with appropriate credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs into the LIMS system.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the integration settings and configure the SAP ERP connection using the vendor adapter.
test_steps.expected_result: Configuration settings are saved without errors.

test_steps.action: Send a test batch record from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is successfully transmitted and appears in SAP ERP.

acceptance_criteria: LIMS successfully connects to SAP ERP via the vendor adapter.
Data transmitted matches the expected format and content in SAP ERP.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurately transmitted without corruption.
Audit trail must record all integration events.

test_cases.objective: Ensure the sample login screens are correctly configured to capture site-specific attributes as specified.
prerequisites: LIMS system is installed and configured
Sample login screens are configured per URS

test_steps.action: Log into the LIMS system with Analyst credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs into the LIMS system.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the sample login screen and attempt to register a new sample.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample login screen displays all required fields.

test_steps.action: Enter a batch number (alphanumeric, 10 characters), manufacturing date, and select storage conditions from the dropdown.
test_steps.expected_result: All fields accept input as specified, and expiry date is calculated correctly based on product master data.

acceptance_criteria: All specified fields are present and functional.
Expiry date is calculated correctly based on product master data.
Storage conditions dropdown contains all required options.
data_integrity_requirements: All entered data must be accurately saved and retrievable.
Audit trail must record all sample login events.

test_cases.objective: Verify the successful integration of LIMS with SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample data transfer from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Data should be successfully transferred and reflected in SAP ERP.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer completes without errors
Data integrity maintained
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data consistency between LIMS and SAP ERP

test_cases.objective: Ensure the LIMS can handle a sample throughput of 500 samples per day as specified.

test_steps.action: Load 500 samples into the LIMS for processing.
test_steps.expected_result: All samples should be processed within the expected timeframe.

acceptance_criteria: All samples processed within 24 hours
No system crashes or errors
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all sample data is accurately processed

test_cases.objective: Verify the LIMS system's integration with SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample registration in LIMS
test_steps.expected_result: Sample data should be successfully transmitted to SAP ERP

acceptance_criteria: Sample data is accurately reflected in SAP ERP
No transmission errors
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data consistency between LIMS and SAP ERP

test_cases.objective: Ensure the LIMS system can handle 500 samples per day as specified in the URS.

test_steps.action: Register 500 samples in LIMS
test_steps.expected_result: All samples should be registered without errors

acceptance_criteria: All 500 samples are registered successfully
System response time within acceptable limits
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all sample data is accurately recorded

test_cases.test_name: Integration with SAP ERP via Vendor Adapter
test_cases.objective: Verify the successful integration of the LIMS with the existing SAP ERP system using the vendor's standard adapter.
prerequisites: Vendor adapter is installed and configured

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample data transfer from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transferred to SAP ERP without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer completes within expected time frame
No errors are logged during transfer
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transfer
Verify data accuracy post-transfer

test_cases.objective: Validate that the LIMS can support concurrent use by 50 users without performance degradation.

test_steps.action: Simulate 50 users logging into the LIMS simultaneously.
test_steps.expected_result: All users can log in and perform tasks without significant delays.

acceptance_criteria: All users can log in within 10 seconds
System response time remains under 2 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure no data corruption during high load
Verify user session integrity

test_cases.test_name: Verify LIMS Sample Login Screen Configuration
test_cases.objective: To verify that the sample login screen is correctly configured to capture site-specific attributes as per URS-LIMS-004.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the sample login screen in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample login screen is displayed with all required fields visible.

test_steps.action: Enter test data into each field on the sample login screen.
test_steps.expected_result: All fields accept input as per configured specifications.

test_steps.action: Submit the sample login form.
test_steps.expected_result: Form is submitted successfully and data is saved in the system.

acceptance_criteria: All fields are correctly configured and accept input as per URS-LIMS-004.
Form submission is successful and data is saved accurately.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data entered is accurately saved and retrievable.

test_cases.test_name: Validate LIMS Integration with SAP ERP
test_cases.objective: To validate the integration between LIMS and SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter as per URS-LIMS-003.

test_steps.action: Create a test sample in LIMS with relevant data.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample is created successfully in LIMS.

test_steps.action: Trigger the data transfer from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is transferred successfully to SAP ERP.

test_steps.action: Verify the received data in SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Data in SAP ERP matches the data sent from LIMS.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer from LIMS to SAP ERP is successful.
Received data in SAP ERP matches the sent data.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity is maintained during transfer.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with SAP ERP via Vendor Adapter
test_cases.objective: Verify the LIMS system successfully integrates with SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter.
prerequisites: Vendor adapter is installed and configured

test_steps.action: Initiate a sample data transfer from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transferred without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer completes within expected time frame
No errors in transfer logs
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during transfer

test_cases.test_name: Performance Test for Concurrent User Access
test_cases.objective: Ensure the LIMS system supports concurrent use by 50 users without performance degradation.
prerequisites: System is configured for load testing

test_steps.action: Simulate 50 users logging into the LIMS system simultaneously.
test_steps.expected_result: All users can log in and perform tasks without delays.

acceptance_criteria: All users can access the system within 5 seconds
No system crashes or errors
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data consistency during high load

test_cases.test_name: Integration with SAP ERP via Vendor Standard Adapter
test_cases.objective: Verify successful data exchange between LIMS and SAP ERP using the vendor's standard adapter.

test_steps.action: Log in to LIMS and navigate to the integration settings.
test_steps.expected_result: Integration settings page displays with SAP ERP adapter configuration options.

test_steps.action: Send a test batch record from LIMS to SAP ERP.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record appears in SAP ERP within 2 minutes with all fields intact.

acceptance_criteria: Data transmission completes within 2 minutes
All fields in the test record match between systems
data_integrity_requirements: Data must remain unchanged during transmission
Audit trail must record transmission events

test_cases.objective: Validate that stability study protocols are correctly configured using vendor tools.

test_steps.action: Create a new stability study protocol in LIMS using vendor configuration tools.
test_steps.expected_result: Protocol creation wizard opens with all required fields available.

test_steps.action: Configure sampling intervals and test parameters per predefined requirements.
test_steps.expected_result: System saves protocol with all parameters correctly applied.

acceptance_criteria: Protocol executes according to configured intervals
All test parameters are enforced during execution
data_integrity_requirements: Protocol parameters must be locked after QA approval
Version control must be maintained

test_cases.test_name: Verify LIMS Sample Login Screen Configuration
test_cases.objective: To verify that the sample login screen is correctly configured to capture site-specific attributes as per URS-LIMS-004.

test_steps.action: Access the sample login screen in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Sample login screen is displayed with fields for batch number, manufacturing date, expiry date, and storage conditions.

test_steps.action: Enter sample data including batch number, manufacturing date, and select storage conditions.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is accepted and expiry date is calculated correctly based on product master data.

acceptance_criteria: All fields are present and correctly labeled
Expiry date calculation is accurate
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data entered is accurately captured and stored

test_cases.objective: To validate that report generation completes within the specified time frame of 5 minutes for standard templates as per URS-LIMS-013.

test_steps.action: Select a standard report template in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Report template is selected and ready for generation.

test_steps.action: Initiate report generation and record the time taken.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generation completes within 5 minutes.

acceptance_criteria: Report generation completes within 5 minutes
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure generated report is accurate and complete
